Our Future Plans

Expanding horizons through innovation and quality excellence.

Upcoming Aluminium Foundry

We are setting up a dedicated aluminium foundry with an installed capacity of 20 MT per month, combining green sand and gravity die casting processes.

  • 300 KG electrical holding furnace for 2–3 stations (Sand, GDC, Tilt)
  • Spectrometer with 15-element analysis
  • Industrial components for automotive, pumps, general engineering, and energy segments

Expansion Goals

  • Strengthening export network to Gulf and European countries
  • Investing in automation and quality systems
  • Developing as a one-stop sourcing hub for multi-material components
